sourcing.instructions: Co (Cobalt) - Purchase from a chemical supply store or online supplier; Fe (Iron) - Obtain from a metallurgy supplier; P (Phosphorus) - Chemical supplier; Tm (Thulium) - Specialty metal supplier.
steps: Co (Cobalt) - Purchase from a chemical supply store or online supplier; Fe (Iron) - Obtain from a metallurgy supplier; P (Phosphorus) - Chemical supplier; Tm (Thulium) - Specialty metal supplier.

1. Measure out 320 g of cobalt powder.  2. Measure out 80 g of iron powder.  3. Measure out 240 g of phosphorus powder.  4. Measure out 80 g of thulium powder.  5. Combine all powders in a clean, dry container.  6. Use a mortar and pestle to thoroughly mix the powders until homogeneous.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure out 320 g of cobalt powder.  2. Measure out 80 g of iron powder.  3. Measure out 240 g of phosphorus powder.  4. Measure out 80 g of thulium powder.  5. Combine all powders in a clean, dry container.  6. Use a mortar and pestle to thoroughly mix the powders until homogeneous.

steps: 1. Preheat a furnace to 900 째C.  2. Place the mixed powder in a ceramic crucible.  3. Heat the crucible at 900 째C for 2 hours to facilitate reaction and consolidation.
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat a furnace to 900 째C.  2. Place the mixed powder in a ceramic crucible.  3. Heat the crucible at 900 째C for 2 hours to facilitate reaction and consolidation.

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours).  2. Once cool, carefully remove the crucible from the furnace.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours).  2. Once cool, carefully remove the crucible from the furnace.

steps: 1. Inspect the solid sample for any cracks or irregularities.  2. If necessary, use a diamond grinder to smooth out any rough edges.  3. Optionally, apply a protective sealant to enhance surface durability.  4. Allow the sealant to cure for 24 hours before handling.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Inspect the solid sample for any cracks or irregularities.  2. If necessary, use a diamond grinder to smooth out any rough edges.  3. Optionally, apply a protective sealant to enhance surface durability.  4. Allow the sealant to cure for 24 hours before handling.
